瓨字的基本解释

瓨
xiáng
长颈的瓮坛类容器。

瓨
hóng
陶器。

瓨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiáng］［hóng］
［《集韻》乎攻切，平冬，匣。］
［《集韻》胡江切，平江，匣。］
长颈大腹的陶器。

瓨字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【瓦字部】　瓨； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页748第08
【唐韻】【集韻】?古雙切，音江。【說文】似罌，長頸，受十升。【前漢·貨殖傳】醯醬千瓨。【註】師古曰：瓨，長頸甖也。受十升。　又【集韻】乎攻切，音䃔。義同。　又胡江切，音夅。與缸同。　又寒剛切，音斻。【博雅】甁也。　又胡公切，音洪。陶器。

瓨字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
瓨字的起名意思

暂无。

瓨
Basic explanation of words
瓨
xiang
Long-necked urn type container.
瓨
hóng
pottery.
瓨
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiáng］［hóng］
["Jiyun" is about attacking and cutting, Pingdong, Xie. ]
["Jiyun" Hu Jiangqi, Pingjiang, Xia. ]
Pottery with long neck and big belly.
瓨
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Wu Ji 1] [Wa Zi Department] 　瓨; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 748 08
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Ancient double cut, Yinjiang. 【Said the text】Like a poppy, long neck, ten liters. [Previous Han · Huo Shi Chuan] Qian-cun with sauce. [Note] Shigu said: 瓨, long-necked poppy. Subject to ten liters.　[Jiyun] Almost attacking and cutting, the sound is 䃔. The same meaning.　 Hu Jiangqie again, sound 夅. Same as the cylinder.　Chill again, Otomo. [Bo Ya] Ye Ye.　 Hu Gong cut again, Yin Hong. pottery.
瓨
